query:
UPDATE jobs 
SET applicationDeadline = CASE 
  WHEN id % 3 = 0 THEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 DAY)
  WHEN id % 3 = 1 THEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)
  ELSE DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 15 DAY)
END
WHERE id % 4 != 3
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Qn11raqpZKapJrc.584a41145ea0 --database myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA --execute UPDATE jobs 
SET applicationDeadline = CASE 
  WHEN id % 3 = 0 THEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 DAY)
  WHEN id % 3 = 1 THEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)
  ELSE DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 15 DAY)
END
WHERE id % 4 != 3
